message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $135, but that's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
